reviewText:
First of all there is so little footage of Miguel Rios Live that this is a find.
To top it there is much more content as far as song list in the DVD that that specified in the box.

A great performance by the best Spanish Roick Voice ever!

If anyone nows of more DVD's from Miguel Rios shoot me an email. jccasas@live.com
I already have Rock 'n' Rios if there ever was anything from Big Band Rios on DVD it would be spectacular.....

Highly Recommend this item.
